ygData.subject: Re: Lvl 16 spell question...
ygData.msgSnippet: The pearl is in sewers of Freeport too, at the necro guild there. ... From: Tony B  To:  Sent: Tuesday, July
ygData.messageBody:
The pearl is in sewers of Freeport too, at the necro guild there.



----- Original Message -----
From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 12:59 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Lvl 16 spell question...


> From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
>
> i bought my pearl at the lodge of the dead in neriak. i think it was
around
> 5pp. is there anywhere that sells the hard to find spells, or is research
> the total solution?
>
> belphenor
>
>
> >From: John & Heather Summers <dualdocs@...>
> >
> >Dear Bladd,
> >
> >Banshee Aura is an incredible spell. I cast it before initiating melee
and
> >after the mob frenzies on me, which it always does after stacking dots,
and
> >it does 8 pts of damage each time it hits. It always helps me finish off
> >the yellows that I solo. The pearl is a one time purchase and well worth
> >it. I don't know where it is available, a guild member found one on a
> >vendor at Lake Rathe i believe and got it for me. Good luck.
> >
> >Grymspine Mael'fesience
> >Level 20 Necromancer
> >Mithaniel Marr
> >
> >
> >>From: Bladd <bladd@...>
> >>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> >>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> >>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Lvl 16 spell question...
